user.description: Configure price enrichment, battery, EV charging, and solar forecast.

data_description.nordpool_entity: Select your Nordpool spot price sensor (e.g., sensor.nordpool_kwh_se3_sek_3_10_025)
data_description.price_tax: Energy tax charged by the government per kWh
data_description.price_transfer: Cost for transferring electricity through the grid per kWh
data_description.price_surcharge: Additional surcharge from your electricity supplier per kWh
data_description.price_fixed_monthly: Fixed monthly fee from your electricity contract
data_description.price_include_fixed: Distribute the fixed monthly fee across hourly prices
data_description.batt_cap_kwh: Total usable capacity of your home battery in kWh
data_description.batt_soc_entity: Sensor that reports current battery state of charge as percentage
data_description.batt_adapter: Adapter for controlling your battery system
data_description.huawei_device_id: Device ID for Huawei battery systems
data_description.house_cons_sensor: Optional legacy sensor for house consumption monitoring
data_description.ev_mode: Currently only manual mode is supported
data_description.ev_batt_kwh: Total battery capacity of your electric vehicle
data_description.ev_current_soc: Current state of charge of your EV battery
data_description.ev_target_soc: Desired state of charge for your EV
data_description.evse_start_switch: Switch entity to start EV charging
data_description.evse_stop_switch: Switch entity to stop EV charging
data_description.evse_current_number: Number entity to control charging current in Amperes
data_description.evse_min_a: Minimum charging current supported by your EVSE
data_description.evse_max_a: Maximum charging current supported by your EVSE
data_description.evse_voltage: Line voltage at your location (typically 230V in Europe)
data_description.fs_use: Enable solar production forecasting using Forecast.Solar
data_description.fs_apikey: Optional API key for enhanced Forecast.Solar features
data_description.fs_lat: Latitude of your solar installation location
data_description.fs_lon: Longitude of your solar installation location
data_description.fs_planes: JSON array describing your solar panel arrays with declination, azimuth, and kWp
data_description.fs_horizon: Comma-separated horizon angles for shading calculations
data_description.pv_power_entity: Sensor reporting current solar power production
data_description.pv_energy_today_entity: Sensor reporting total solar energy produced today
data_description.runtime_source: Method for calculating baseline house consumption
data_description.runtime_counter_entity: Energy counter sensor for consumption tracking
data_description.load_power_entity: Total house load power for exclusion calculations
data_description.batt_power_entity: Battery power sensor. By default expects positive=charging, negative=discharging. If your sensor shows negative values when charging, enable 'Invert Battery Power Sign' below
data_description.batt_power_invert_sign: Enable if your battery power sensor uses Huawei convention (negative=charging, positive=discharging). Check your sensor: if it shows negative values when battery is charging, enable this option
data_description.grid_import_today_entity: Daily grid import sensor for monitoring
data_description.runtime_alpha: Smoothing factor for exponential moving average (lower=smoother)
data_description.runtime_window_min: Time window in minutes for baseline calculations
data_description.runtime_exclude_ev: Exclude EV charging power from house baseline calculation
data_description.runtime_exclude_batt_grid: Exclude battery charging from grid in baseline calculation
data_description.runtime_soc_floor: Minimum battery SOC for runtime calculations
data_description.runtime_soc_ceiling: Maximum battery SOC for runtime calculations
